attributes.action: Give Towcester the relief it needs - a bypass now.
attributes.additional_details:
Traffic volume increases year on year. When incidents block the M1, M40 or A43 our town is gridlocked.

Residents, visitors & workers suffer the air pollution, noise & heavy traffic.

We will have to wait until 1016 new dwellings are occupied before enjoying a functioning residential single-carriage ‘relief road’.

This is no relief for Towcester. Current & future residents, visitors & businesses deserve better.

We need a safe, dual-carriageway bypass with sound & pollution buffering.
attributes.background:
With current levels of traffic our market town is in desperate need of a bypass.

Quality of life measures, such as health, safety, sleep & stress are negatively affected by traffic volumes.

We are set to see a massive increase in traffic volume as TOWCESTER FACES MORE THAN 2500 NEW DWELLINGS.
